page.title: 04The Industrial Estate
page.content: The{estate}was opened in the 1940's but got underway in the 1960's.Since then it has grown conciderably and there is a good diversity of business. We walked the estate today,June 24th 1985 to see the extent and type of factory there is.There are{5 main categories.{a) Double glazing. {b)Engineering(large and small).c)Food {and food distribution.d)clothing and {footwear.e)Auto spares. We visited four of the doubling glazing factories.People today are very aware of the need to conserve heat and energy. Everest is the most well known double glazing firm.They took us on a tour of inspection. Frozen foods,food preparation and food distribution are well to the fore;as these are also a modern aspect of the industrial scene.
